No,Tokugawa and Hideyoshi would never have ended like they did.If Nobunaga =
didn't take all that territory,Hideyoshi would have never been to Korea....=
.and perhaps the Tokugawa dinasty would't have existed....

Edy

iginal Message -----

  Anyways, would Hideiyoshi and =
Tokugawa have gotten that far without
  Nobunaga=B4s incursions? Specially =
Tokuwaga, who seemed to be at the right
  time, at the right place? Whilst =
I do not intend to set myself as an expert
  on the field (an enthusiast, r=
ather - please bear this in mind), would it be
  too far from feasible boun=
ds to hold that Tokugawa won by default (lack of
  capable opponents)?

  T=
